languages.text:
Чтобы понять, что именно произошло в бою, посмотрите записи сражения. Все действия, совершенные вашим персонажем, его спутникам и врагами, фиксируются в логе боя в правом нижнем углу экрана.
Удерживайте {console_bind|RightUp}, чтобы активировать лог боя справа и выберите интересующую запись. Если вы хотите изучить запись подробнее, удерживайте {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Чтобы понять, что именно произошло в бою, посмотрите записи сражения. Все действия, совершенные вашим персонажем, его спутниками и врагами, фиксируются в логе боя в правом нижнем углу экрана.
Нажмите {console_bind|???}, чтобы активировать лог боя справа и выберите интересующую запись. Если вы хотите изучить запись подробнее, удерживайте {console_bind|RightStickButton}

languages.text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
Чтобы понять, что именно произошло в бою, посмотрите записи сражения. Все действия, совершенные вашим персонажем, его спутникам и врагами, фиксируются в логе боя в правом нижнем углу экрана.
Удерживайте {console_bind|RightUp}, чтобы активировать лог боя справа и выберите интересующую запись. Если вы хотите изучить запись подробнее, удерживайте {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what just transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
Échale un vistazo al registro de combate para comprender mejor lo que ocurre en el campo de batalla. Todas las acciones que realicen tu personaje, sus compañeros y los enemigos quedan plasmadas en el registro que está en la parte inferior derecha de la pantalla.
Mantén {console_bind|RightUp} para abrir el registro de combate y elegir la entrada que te interese. Para leerla con más detenimiento, mantén {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Échale un vistazo al registro de combate para comprender mejor lo que ocurre en el campo de batalla. Todas las acciones que realicen tu personaje, sus compañeros y los enemigos quedan plasmadas en el registro que está en la parte inferior derecha de la pantalla.
Mantén {console_bind|RightUp} para abrir el registro de combate y elegir la entrada que te interese. Para leerla con más detenimiento, mantén {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
戦闘ログを確認すると、戦闘で何が起こったのかをより深く理解することができる。自分のキャラクター、仲間、敵が行ったアクションはすべて、画面右下の戦闘ログに記録される。
{console_bind|RightUp}を長押しして戦闘ログを表示し、興味のあるエントリーを選ぼう。エントリーの詳細を読むには、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を長押しする。
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘ログを確認すると、戦闘で何が起こったのかをより深く理解することができる。自分のキャラクター、仲間、敵が行ったアクションはすべて、画面右下の戦闘ログに記録される。
{console_bind|RightUp}を長押しして戦闘ログを表示し、興味のあるエントリーを選ぶ。エントリーの詳細を読むには、{console_bind|RightStickButton} を長押しする。

languages.text:
您可以查看战斗日志，更好地了解战斗过程。您的角色、同伴与敌人的所有行动，都会记录在屏幕右下角的战斗日志中。
按住{console_bind|RightUp}可以调出战斗日志，选择您感兴趣的条目。按住{console_bind|RightStickButton}可以详细阅读选中的条目。
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
您可以查看战斗日志，更好地了解战斗过程。您的角色、同伴与敌人的所有行动，都会记录在屏幕右下角的战斗日志中。
按住{console_bind|RightUp}可以调出战斗日志，选择您感兴趣的条目。按住{console_bind|RightStickButton}可以详细阅读选中的条目。

languages.text:
Du kannst dir ein besseres Bild davon machen, was im Kampf passiert ist, indem du dir das Kampflog ansiehst. Alle Aktionen deines Charakters, seiner Begleiter und Gegner werden im Kampflog in der unteren rechten Ecke des Bildschirms aufgelistet.
Halte {console_bind|RightUp} gedrückt, um das Kampflog aufzurufen und wähle einen Eintrag aus, der dich interessiert. Um die Details des Eintrags genauer zu lesen, halte {console_bind|RightStickButton} gedrückt.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst dir ein besseres Bild davon machen, was im Kampf passiert ist, indem du dir das Kampflog ansiehst. Alle Aktionen deines Charakters, seiner Begleiter und Gegner werden im Kampflog in der unteren rechten Ecke des Bildschirms aufgelistet.
Halte {console_bind|RightUp} gedrückt, um das Kampflog aufzurufen und wähle einen Eintrag aus, der dich interessiert. Um die Details des Eintrags genauer zu lesen, halte {console_bind|RightStickButton} gedrückt.

languages.text:
Pour mieux comprendre ce qui s'est passé lors de l'affrontement, consultez le journal de combat. Toutes les actions effectuées par votre personnage, ses compagnons et ses ennemis sont consignées dans le journal de combat situé dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran.
Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightUp} pour afficher le journal de combat et choisissez l'entrée qui vous intéresse. Pour lire cette entrée plus en détail, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Pour mieux comprendre ce qui s'est passé lors du combat, consultez le journal de combat. Toutes les actions effectuées par votre personnage, ses compagnons et ses ennemis sont consignées dans le journal de combat situé dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran.
Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightUp} pour afficher le journal de combat et choisissez une entrée qui vous intéresse. Pour lire cette entrée plus en détail, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
Çatışma kayıtlarına göz atarak çatışmada neler cereyan ettiğini daha iyi anlayabilirsin. Karakter, onun yoldaşları ve düşmanlar tarafından gerçekleştirilen tüm eylemler, ekranın sağ alt köşesindeki çatışma kayıtlarına kaydedilir.
Çatışma kayıtlarını ekrana getirmek için {console_bind|RightUp} düğmesini basılı tut ve ilgini çeken kaydı seç. Kaydın ayrıntılarını inceleyebilmek için {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesini basılı tut.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Hold {console_bind|RightUp} to bring up the combat log and choose an entry that interests you. To read the entry in more detail, hold {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
